title: My phone has network problem it always got H or H+ network insted of LTE
content: I'm getting always H or H+ network on my phone i'm on Virgin mobile whenever i turned off data and turned it on sometime it work network gone totally and come back with LTE after sometime it automatically changed H or H+ anyone facing this issue in pixel 3 XL
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
